name: HireMatter
tag_list: software, engineering, computer-science, technology, recruiting, executive-placements, staffing, agile, developer
overview:
HireMatter is a recruitment firm that specializes exclusively in cutting-edge technology placement. Unlike the typical recruiting agency, HireMatter was created from a successful software startup, allowing for unique insight of what it takes to succeed in the tech industry. Our keen understanding of the business and product development process including Agile Methodologies contributes to our placement success. We currently maintain a rich network of technology professionals, software engineers, developers, etc. This unique combination of expertise has given us an insider view with a blend of in-house, agency, and contract experience.

With a successful track record placing tech/software industry talent; we understand what it takes to develop diverse, candidate pipelines in a cost-effective manner. We consistently exchange ideas and strategies with our clients to help them stay ahead of the game when it comes to attracting and maintaining specialized talent. In addition, we offer our clients the highest possible level of service, while also keeping a close eye on cost per hire, quality of hire, and time to fill.

In addition to recruitment, HireMatter partners with scholarship organizations that help grow the next generation of technology professionals, including: EDSF, High Tech High San Diego and other non-profit organizations.

HireMatter is committed to diversity and is a Woman Owned/Minority Owned company.

Specialties: ♦Software/Product Development ♦SaaS ♦Mobile iOS Development ♦Android ♦Gaming ♦Geopspatial ♦Software Engineers ♦Human Capital ♦Cloud Computing Software ♦Startups ♦Fortune 500
